meanings.sent1: The light passing through the unpolarized filter was not separated into different directions.
meanings.sent2: The unpolarized light source emitted light waves in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The unpolarized magnet couldn't decide which way to attract the metal.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like an unpolarized compass, constantly changing direction.
meanings.sent5: The unpolarized glass made the view blurry and unclear.

meanings.definition: Not having a specific direction of orientation
meanings.sent1: The unpolarized antenna received signals from all directions.
meanings.sent2: The unpolarized molecule could rotate freely in any orientation.
meanings.sent3: The unpolarized cat kept spinning in circles, unable to choose a direction.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an unpolarized compass, lost and directionless.
meanings.sent5: The unpolarized map confused the travelers with its lack of orientation.

meanings.sent1: The unpolarized light appeared as a mix of different colors.
meanings.sent2: The unpolarized wave had varying amplitudes at different angles.
meanings.sent3: The unpolarized party had guests from all walks of life, no specific group dominating.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like an unpolarized storm, chaotic and unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The unpolarized atmosphere created a sense of randomness and diversity.
